title: If a man sees a muslim sister doing haram, how should he advise her? #Assim #quran assim al hakeem
transcript: sh if I see a Muslim sister committing any Haram action or going towards Haram action by following the steps of the Shan how should I stop her ask your wife to give her a reminder and advise her or ask your sister or speak to her brother speak to her father don't speak to her directly because this opens the doors of shatan for both of you
